body: why this 'Mama-tachi no Asedaku Soukan Nikki ~Boshi no Susume "Mon" is a continuation of part 1 and also there's other part 2 named "Boshi no Susume 2", the autor make 2 different continuation of part 1, and is stupid, instead of make part 4 and 5, he ruin the story with 2 part 2, and also part 1 is the same story as part 2 & 'Mama-tachi no Asedaku Soukan Nikki ~Boshi no Susume "Mon", so it means that you can read part 1 and then read part 3 that is the continuation of part 1, part 2 and 'Mama-tachi no Asedaku Soukan Nikki ~Boshi no Susume "Mon" both can be used as part 1, this author piss me off for that reason, he don't connect the stories from he's previous volumes
